CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] ( PIDT - EHNT ) |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] ( PIDT - DTNT ) |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) |

Note that the entities are presented exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, including any punctuation or capitalization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Material name" in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole))] |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole))] |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] ( PIDT - EHNT ) |
| poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)] ( PIDT - DTNT ) |

In the table, each entity is listed with its corresponding property value. For example, "poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)]" is the name of the first entity, and "PIDT - EHNT" is its property value, which indicates that it is the weak donor in the synthesis of the polymer. Similarly, "poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)]" is the name of the second entity, and "PIDT - DTNT" is its property value, which indicates that it is the strong acceptor in the synthesis of the polymer.
